title: Council Directive 69/64/EEC of 18 February 1969 amending the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of forest reproductive material
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 18 February 1969  amending the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of forest reproductive material  (69/64/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following shall be substituted for subparagraphs (a) to (c) of Article 18 (1) of the Council Directive of 14 June 1966 on the marketing of forest reproductive material;
"(a) not later than 1 July 1969 for seeds and part of plants of:
Abies alba Mill
Larix decidua Mill
Larix leptolepis (Sieb & Zucc) Gord
Picea abies Karst
Picea sitchensis Trautv et Mey
Pinus nigra Arn
Pinus sylvestris L
Pinus strobus L
Populus
Pseudotsuga taxifolia Britt
Quercus borealis Michx
(b) not later than 1 July 1971 for seeds and parts of plants of :
Fagus sylvatica L
Quercus pendunculata Ehrh
Quercus sessiliflora Sal
".
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 February 1969.
For the Council
The President
J.P. BUCHLER
(1) OJ No C 135, 14.12.1968, p. 25. (2) OJ No C 125, 11.7.1966, p. 2326/66.
